****************************************************
DOLPHIN DEV NOTES - FFMPEG DELAYED LOADING FOR WIN64
****************************************************

ffmpeg externals source from Zeranoe: https://ffmpeg.zeranoe.com/builds/win64/dev/

The standard .lib files provided in the Zeranoe package are not valid for VS/MSVC and DelayLoading will not work!!!

The .lib files have to be rebuilt with one of VS additional tools from the provided .def files in the same package.

Locate the command line utility "lib.exe" in the Vistual Studio installation, for example:
\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Community\VC\Tools\MSVC\xx.xx.xxxxx\bin\Hostx64\x64

Copy the .def files into the root directors where "lib.exe" is for example, and use the Command Prompt to produce the proper .lib files:

lib /machine:x64 /def:avcodec-58.def /out:avcodec.lib
lib /machine:x64 /def:avformat-58.def /out:avformat.lib
lib /machine:x64 /def:avutil-56.def /out:avutil.lib
lib /machine:x64 /def:swresample-3.def /out:swresample.lib
lib /machine:x64 /def:swscale-5.def /out:swscale.lib

The "inlcude" files do not need any modifications at this time.

////////////////
Delayed Loading:
Configured in the "Linker --> Input" options page of the Dolphin's main executable project properties window.
swresample-5.dll does not require DelayLoading, it is a smaller avcodec cross dependency, otherwise VS will produce a warning.
vcxproj: <DelayLoadDLLs>avcodec-58.dll;avformat-58.dll;avutil-56.dll;swscale-5.dll;%(DelayLoadDLLs)</DelayLoadDLLs>
